page.title: 08Village Activities.
page.content: Community Council:meets every 2nd month. 8 people from the village are members, they receive and deal with complaints about bad drainage, gates for the park, roads, bus shelter and street lighting. Monimail Senior Citizens' Association. In the summer the committee organise a drive for all those of retiral age. In the winter they give them 2 bags of coal and a Christmas Dinner followed by a concert. S.W.R.I. The Scottish Woman's Rural Institute is held once a month in the hall. At present there are 15 members. The village hall is used for various fund raising activitirs. The last big occasion was in May when villagers held a Social Evening in honour of the policemanwho retired after 23 years service in the village.
